md:
giải nghĩa từ "poetic" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Poetic:

* Adjective: (thơ ca) - relating to or characteristic of poetry
	+ Example: "The poet's poetic language was beautiful and expressive."
	+ Related words: poetry, poet, verse, lyrical
	+ Antonyms: prosaic, mundane

* Adjective: (tình cảm, lãng mạn) - having a romantic or sentimental quality
	+ Example: "The poetic scenery of the countryside inspired the artist's paintings."
	+ Related words: romantic, sentimental, idyllic, picturesque
	+ Antonyms: harsh, brutal, unromantic

Note: The word "poetic" can have different meanings depending on the context. In general, it refers to something that is related to poetry or has a romantic or sentimental quality.
